notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: Study concept and design: LC, XdH. Data acquisition: LC, XdH, YlL, CxZ, XqX. Statistical analysis: LC. Drafting of the manuscript: LC. Critical revision of the manuscript for intellectual content: XdH, XqX. All authors agreed with the article submission. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
